name: WHALE HOUSE
description:
In the not so distant future, the surface of the earth has become uninhabitable for humans due to a sudden infestation of blood thirsty mutant crabs... The only defense they had was to create whales, specifically breed to act as housing for humans. Everyone agreed this could only be a good idea.

Controls

Keyboard and Mouse

ESCAPE - QUIT
F1 - FULLSCREEN

Move - WASD

Aim - Mouse

Laser - Left Click

Jump - Space

Jet Pack - Space in air

Controller

Move - Left Stick or D-Pad

Aim - Right Stick

Laser - Right Trigger

Jump - Left Trigger

Jet Pack - Left Trigger in air

How to Play

Crabs will spawn and attack weak points inside your whale house, if this happens your whale will take damage. Although the whale regenerates rather quickly, the more damage the whale has taken the more of its blood will fill the screen. The crabs will not attack you, but if you stay under the blood for too long, you will drown. With your trusty laser and jet pack you must vanquish all crab invaders. If you use your laser too long it will over heat! If this happens you must wait for it to cool down all the way, or dive into the pool of blood and help cool it down.
